website_summaries.verdict: A high heel you can wear from the office to dinner, as long as you don't have to walk there.
pros: Tall, thick heel provides more stability than a stiletto style
Flattering and comfortable for moderate walking
Leather, suede, or textile upper, depending on color choice
Comes in a variety of colors
cons: The block heel helps make these sandals wearable, but they are still too high for some

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, well fitting.... DAMAGED
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoes. The leather is soft and shoe color is beautiful. Width truely fits like a wide. Used Prime to order for an event in 2 days after not being able to find anything locally. They arrived with glue on the toe strap for one shoe. In trying to remove the glue the gold was removed. No time to return so I'm stuck wearing a messed up shoe. Incredibly disappointing, especially at this price point!!
customer_reviews.author: IHaveAnAmazonProblem

customer_reviews.title: Wow!! Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Wow is really all I can say. I’m so impressed by this heel. I bought it in brocade and it’s gorgeous but I’m more impressed by how well constructed it is. It is very sturdy, which is great for my weak ankles (from numerous sprains over the years). I can stand tall with no wobbling, which is more than I can say from the similar pair from *VC* that I purchased recently. They aren’t the most comfortable heel I’ve ever worn as they are 4 inches with no platform, but they are sturdy and I can walk in them with no problem. Definitely going to buy more soon.
customer_reviews.author: JustAGirl

customer_reviews.title: Confortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoe and very confortable, wore them to a wedding this past weekend and could dance and stand for long periods of time without having my feet hurt!
customer_reviews.author: MLCI

customer_reviews.title: I wore the target knock off version the previous night and they were so very comfortable and then i wore these and was in a ...
customer_reviews.text: These were literally the most uncomfortable shoes I've ever worn. I wore the target knock off version the previous night and they were so very comfortable and then i wore these and was in a lot of pain. Debated if they were even real Sam Edelman's because of it.
customer_reviews.author: adnurse

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I wore these shoes standing from 5:30 pm to 2:30 am and they win my vote for being a comfortable heel. Are they like walking on pillows, flats, or tennis shoes... No, they're heels. In fact, I woke up with a toe that was numb for two days afterwards... but it was only one toe, there were no blisters, and I never felt like I was debilitated by my feet and could only move forward by taking off my shoes. For me, that's a sign of a very comfortable heel. They were so much better than my Steve Madden pair in the same style. Really pretty shoes that I would not hesitate to buy in more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected,  very comfy
customer_reviews.text: Got these today and i must say i was a bit skeptical at first because i have the same style in a different brand that do not fit well at all but i am very satisfied with my purchase, shoes fit as expected and they are very comfy... Will order again... 4 stars for now because they haven't been worn as yet. I wear size 9 and i ordered my size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoe. Beware the ankle strap is not long ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoe. Beware the ankle strap is not long if you have bigger ankles. My ankles are average but I am on the last hole on the strap. If they were any bigger, these shoes wouldn't work. I have average width feet but I bought the Wide in these. I'm glad I went with the wide.
customer_reviews.author: ldavis

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, equally uncomfortable. Order 1/2 size up!
customer_reviews.text: Order 1/2 a size up. I am a 7 in every brand, but needed a 7.5. I gave these three stars because they are painfully uncomfortable, but also extremely adorable. So if you only need to wear them for a few hours they are fine but if you need to wear them to a wedding (like I did) I would not suggest.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High Heel
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are super cute. I normally wear 10-10.5 and 10 fit perfect. Just disappointed bc I thought they were the same as my other Yaro sandals and they weren't. The heel is way to high for me so sadly I have to return.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Loooove it, but...
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: They’re not that comfortable, By the end of the wedding I couldn’t walk straight, maybe they take time breaking them in!! I’m an 8.5 in, almost, all shoes I was scared on this one since my foot is wide and this color wasnt available in wide... I ordered the 8.5 and it fits great! Bought them for a wedding and I hope they’re comfortable...
customer_reviews.author: Zoila M

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this pair after a few other fails while looking for a comfortable dressy strappy sandal high heel for a few weddings. The chunky heel is super comfortable and I was able to stay on my feet all night! They are a little on the taller side - I do recommend walking around the house in them if you do not regularly wear heels until you are able to find your balance.
customer_reviews.author: E. Tejada

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if the suede is much better but I wore these for a wedding and my feet were killing me by hour 2! Specifically the balls of my feet. I even purchased gel inserts in case this happened and nothing worked! I took them off after the ceremony. I heard someone with the same shoes "broke" them in several weeks prior but just know--if you're like me and don't wear high heels often--beware. Though the block heel is nice, it doesn't provide much in terms of comfortability.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous shoe. Insanely Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of these. The shoe is just insanely uncomfortable. The band is not soft at all and kind of cuts into your foot. I also got pads to put under the ball of the foot to help with comfort due to the height and that helps a tad, but overall the straps are too stiff and uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty and Sexy
customer_reviews.text: I bought the clear nude ones and they're very beautiful. Get it half a size smaller than your normal size. Because the clear ones are plastic, its hard and not as comfortable as the other ones so I can't walk long with them on. I also bought the floral one and that one is much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: TVang

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are absolutely adorable. They are pretty comfortable and feel sturdy because of the thick heel!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Winter

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not the most comfy.
customer_reviews.text: Needed a navy suede shoe to match graduation dresses. Heel is very high but the chunky heel helps with stability. Wide size options helped too. I till needed an insert/cushion. I got through 4 hours of mostly standing and walking around a city and graduation events before I switched to the flip flops in my purse. I guess you'll look cute for as long as you can tolerate them.
customer_reviews.author: student x

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: These might be the most gorgeous shoes in my closet now! I loved them...wore them to a wedding and danced all night long (well, until 10 pm anyway)! They were a bit higher than I realized but still relatively comfortable. The ball of my feet were a bit sore at the end of the night...but what high heels don't do that after dancing in them!
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Cute but I don’t love the arch
customer_reviews.text: Attractive and comfortable shoes. I plan to keep them but as someone with a flatter foot the arch feels awkward and walking is less natural than with other heels the same height
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Ankle strap too tight
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are beautiful, however the ankle strap was too tight even on the last hole. I have many other ankle strap heels just like this in other brands and the strap isn’t tight at all so I was a bit disappointed when I tried these on. I love Sam edelman shoes, but I knew I’d be uncomfortable with tight strap, so I returned them. Also, with these type/design of heels, I recommend doing a half size down. I’m usually a size 10, but I learned with these types of heels you definitely want to get a half size down if possible. Otherwise there is too much room/slipping of the heel.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Lynn Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color and sandal style. The heel is really high, if there was sufficient cushion or a slight platform that would make a huge difference in comfort. I am keeping because the price was too great but I will be sitting alot.
customer_reviews.author: Tee Millee12

customer_reviews.title: Size up
customer_reviews.text: I love the SE Yaro cork heels so much that I decided to buy the smoky black patent leather. Unfortunately, they ran different from my first pair and by the end of the day, my feet were killing me. I work in an office setting, and I don’t walk around much and yet these were painful to walk in by end of day. I will be returning these as I can’t wear them and hopefully find a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Marie

customer_reviews.title: great arch support
customer_reviews.text: True to size, great arch support, and very comfortable! I ordered the Jute metallic leather and it is the perfect amount of metallic to go with any outfit. I am a size 9 and ordered a 9 (I'm a 9.5 in Jessica Simpson heels - if that helps).
customer_reviews.author: Lyra604

customer_reviews.title: Great pop of color shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these shoes with a black dress for a benefit and they offered a nice pop of color. They are just as described. Although the heel is somewhat high, it was fairly comfortable since I ordered in a wide width. It is always hard to find fashionable sandals in a wide width and thankfully Sam Edelman offers some.
customer_reviews.author: Antoniette Lifrieri

customer_reviews.title: Unique
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoe. Unique. I returned though b/c I changed my outfit. My one issue is these shoes do not have a strap long enough for thicker ankles. They fit but the ankle was quite tight and uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Not the Most Comfortable But Really Nice Looking
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty good at walking in heels and this height is totally manageable. I love the look! Only issue is the strap cuts in to my ankle so I can't wear them if I'm walking around a lot and need to have band aids on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Smith

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but just too tall for me
customer_reviews.text: Pretty, but just too tall for me. I fell like I was being forced to fall forward. I was scared I was going to break the straps!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Cute heels
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shade of brown that is a more accurate nude shade for my skin tone. The heel is high but not ridiculously high. Maybe a 3hr with dancing threshold on wearing these. 5hrs if you have somewhere to sit.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: More comfortable than they look and great quality
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my wedding and they are so cute. I got so many compliments on them. They’re also so much comfier than they look.
customer_reviews.author: Olive

customer_reviews.title: Returned because the color would be hard to match. ...
customer_reviews.text: Returned because the color would be hard to match. If you need some gold or shine to your outfit..this will do it. It’s subtle but still makes a statement. The thin straps don’t hold/give much support so these heels do hurt after a couple hours..as all 4inch heels usually do. Decided to go with black since it’s more versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Oh Most Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is everything awesome. Comfortable, beautiful and just all around wonderful. However, sadly the color was not a match for what I needed so I had to return it, but looking to repurchase soon.
customer_reviews.author: Coopers Love Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh....
customer_reviews.text: This item does run small so I suggest to size up. The color was on point though. There are also a lot of other labels that make a similar shoe there doesn’t seem to be a difference in regards to comfort. Ultimately, I bought a black pair from Payless for $30.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Worn before
customer_reviews.text: Shoe came clearly worn with footprints and scuff marks on the bottom. It also had glitter all over it.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Walker

customer_reviews.title: Neon vs Soft pink
customer_reviews.text: The color is NOTHING like the picture. If you’re expecting a soft pink you’ll be highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Teal

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Famazing Cork Heels
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are spectacular. Wonderful size heel and good quality. I got them at a great price and they did not disappoint. I usually wear between a 9-10. I ordered in a 10 and they fit perfect! I have already gotten so many compliments on them. Want them in every color. Sam Edelman makes high quality shoes love!
customer_reviews.author: Ely Gayol

customer_reviews.title: Weird fitting
customer_reviews.text: The height of the heel put my foot at a funky uncomfortable angle and it made the heel of the shoe gap away from my ankle.
customer_reviews.author: JMW

customer_reviews.title: Nice look
customer_reviews.text: Would have given 5 stars but upon opening my brand new heels, I realized they were already worn or should I say dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Krysteina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: Great heels and if you’re used to high heels this won’t be as high as the reviews make them see. They have a soft cushion interior that makes them very comfy to wear. What I don’t like is the material, i think they are prone to peel off.
customer_reviews.author: AGP92

customer_reviews.title: Great height, but the ankle strap is a killer
customer_reviews.text: I bought a wide based on having wider feet. The heel height was not a huge deterrent. I’m afraid to walk in these based on my ankle size. I have wide ankles and feet. Walking around my house showed how easily I’d fall on my butt wearing these. The height is awesome. The ankle strap need to be longer. I had to use the first hole.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Normally wear a 9.5, but sized up to a 10. These looked phenomenal, actually were extremely comfortable and can dress up or down. So happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect summer sandal
customer_reviews.text: The blockier heel is comfortable enough to wear for hours and the nude color coordinates with all of my summer dresses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe EVER
customer_reviews.text: I honestly just got these because I was desperate for a shoe this color and needed it within 48 hours (and it was the most affordable with that criteria) This is THE most comfortable shoe I have ever worn! So gorgeous, perfect fit. Sam Edelman fan for life.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca O

customer_reviews.title: So. comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are surprisingly very comfortable! Would def buy more. Got rid of my other nude/beige shoes for these!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: These heels are gorgeous. The material is of good quality and they are well made. The only negative thing for me was that they are slightly tight around the toes.
customer_reviews.author: krissy

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I tried to break these shoes in for three weeks before a wedding I was in. I tried every hack to make them bend, and they just would not. My feet are wide, and I am aware of that, but by the end of the ceremony and pictures I was dying to take them off. The balls of my feet were blistered and it hurt to walk the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these!
customer_reviews.text: I wear them to events when I want a pop of color. I've had them for quite some time. LOVE them, they are as comfortable as you would be in heels. I always get compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Letitel

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and classically chic
customer_reviews.text: Bought these foe an outdoor wedding - needed nice heels that wouldn't sink into the grass. These did not disappoint! I know I'll get a lot of wear out of them since they go with everything.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but Too High For ME
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are beautiful but they are entirely too high in height for me. I must return them.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe but very uncomfortable. Wore them work and sat most of the day but my feet hurt SO bad in these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: GAPEACH

customer_reviews.title: I actually really liked the look once I had them on
customer_reviews.text: The shoe itself is very cute. I actually really liked the look once I had them on. They were big though and didn’t fit too comfortably for me. With that being said I realized I ordered a wide so that can also be the reason.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Osorio

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: The product it’s self is lovely, however, the fit on my feet were awful! The strap is too low on the foot and so it hurt so bad. Now, I have wider feet than most so maybe it wasn’t ideal for me, so I wouldn’t recommend for someone who has the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: Ouch!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are evil. I got them for a wedding and the area over the toes was very tight and they hurt like a b**** I could only wear them for like 20 minutes before I finally caved and took them off
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ♥️
customer_reviews.text: My favorite heels, at the moment lol I like the color of the leather and they’re very comfortable . Very happy with Sam Edelman 👠
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Cute but akward
customer_reviews.text: Cute but heel is awkward. The heel is think but way too high it thrusts you forward I believe it should have had some sort of platform to balance the height of the heel.
customer_reviews.author: shoecrazy 70

customer_reviews.title: Tight around ankles.
customer_reviews.text: They were cute to look at, but the strap at the top doesn’t have enough length to it, so they are super tight around the ankle, and no I don’t have cankles.
customer_reviews.author: SouthLaneDesigns

customer_reviews.title: Narrow shoe
customer_reviews.text: Loved the color! Exactly as described and pictured. Shoes came quickly and packed well. My only complaint is the fit. I've worn a size 10 shoe since high school. These shoes run about a half a size small. The length seemed fine. It's the width. I kept em because they are a quality made shoe. I just gave them to my daughter who wears a nine and a half.
customer_reviews.author: Natlie L Key

customer_reviews.title: Classics
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Arrived packaged perfectly and they fit perfectly. I couldn’t find this color at Nordstrom, perfect tan for spring and summer.
customer_reviews.author: Tressa Williams

customer_reviews.title: Color not the same a pictures
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the neon pink shoes based on the picture that is posted here. In the picture they look almost baby pink which is what i was going for. However, when I received them they were BRIGHT NEON pink. Go by the name not the picture. Other than that, super cute shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and they are comfortable for heels. Got them to coordinate with a black and pewter beaded dress for formal occasion and they are perfect! I think I could have found them a bit cheaper, but I liked them so much there was no way I was sending them back. I am a typical 7.5M is almost all shoes and these were no different. Toe strap is not too narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara L.

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am normally a 10 in heels and the 10 in this shoe fit perfectly. They are really cute and look like a good quality shoe in person. Very very comfortable because of the block heel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: These pair of sandals are gorgeous but too big for me I wear 8 or 8.5 for these tipes of shoes but 8.5 are too big for me.
customer_reviews.author: nichols

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect shoes; I'm so happy with them
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect shoes; I'm so happy with them. For four inch heels, they're very comfortable. I've read some complaints in other reviews about the lack of padding, but I haven't experienced any discomfort over this.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Hot heels!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes. Seriously a statement. I received so many compliments!
customer_reviews.author: LBLK

customer_reviews.title: 4 inch heel
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! The light pink is very pretty. I didn't realize the heel is 4 inches, so unfortunately I had to return.
customer_reviews.author: S&J in the NorthTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my sons wedding. They are well made, comfortable and look cute.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoes for Hawaiian wedding
customer_reviews.text: I really loved the print on these shoes! They were perfect for the wedding I attended in Hawaii!
customer_reviews.author: Meaty23

customer_reviews.title: Where is my refund?
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoes just didn’t fit. Returned them but have not received my refund or a response to my email.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Lovelace

customer_reviews.title: Impressive quality and perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: They are absolutely impressive. Perfect quality, perfect color, they look like something super expensive and gorgeous. Amazing quality, im very impressed. It’s a great investment in your wardrobe.
customer_reviews.author: Barney Tool

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Shoe!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVED this shoe!!! Beautiful color! I intend to wear with a yellow jumper. Heel height was just right, not too tall.
customer_reviews.author: Alwayz Helpin

customer_reviews.title: Cute and (relatively) comfy
customer_reviews.text: I get lots of compliments. The heel is tall, so be aware! But much more comfortable than the Nine West equivalent. I can do a full work day in these shoes (desk job).
customer_reviews.author: Snowchick

customer_reviews.title: Great quality - hurts your feet for the fact of the material being too hard.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality - hurts your feet for the fact of the material being too hard.
customer_reviews.author: SaraN

customer_reviews.title: So cute, so uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these because they are so cute and the color is great. BUT... I couldn't wear them for more than 5 minutes and ended up returning them.
customer_reviews.author: xCHRIE

customer_reviews.title: Sam Edelman forever...
customer_reviews.text: Had to stretch out prior to first wear, but they keep getting better and better. First night - no blisters or soreness. Tons of compliments. They also survived a nine hour evening in San Fran. Couldn't ask for more!
customer_reviews.author: Kendallyn

customer_reviews.title: Something to Dazzle
customer_reviews.text: So adorable! The chunky heel makes them comfy. The silver/gold print adds to the "special" look - not just a boring black sandal.
customer_reviews.author: GalGarrick

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely gorgeous color, Cameo Pink
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son's wedding, everything about them are beautiful, the listing did not have the heel height I would say about 4" a little too high for me especially to dance all night! Regretfully I have to return these beautiful shoes, I just can't hang with the really high heels anymore:( . The leather is soft and the color and texture is to die for!
customer_reviews.author: TAMMY JONES

customer_reviews.title: They’re so beautiful and overall great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Even though this are a bit incomfortable due to the fact that I’m not used to 4inch heels. They’re so beautiful and overall great shoes. Love the blue print and good quality of Sam Edelman shoes. True to size! I was lucky enough to get this $120 shoes for $21!
customer_reviews.author: Luz

customer_reviews.title: Giiiirl YAAAAS!
customer_reviews.text: Get 👏 these 👏 shoes 👏 I promise you will not be disappointed! The shoes are slightly tight, but may stretch a bit over time.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite shoes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to complete a date night outfit and ended up wearing them all weekend! I got so many compliments. SUPER comfortable, especially for a heel of this height. There's a slight padding on the insole that I can appreciate. I'm ordering other colors very soon! #mynewfavoriteshoe
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Williams

customer_reviews.title: Best sandals ever
customer_reviews.text: Best sandals ever. I can work all my 8 hours and going out the same day
customer_reviews.author: Lora’s Beauty

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is beautiful and comfortable. I received several compliments on them. Wore them for several hours and did not hurt until midnight. Great shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Delia Carr

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: I love the sandal... I even purchased a second pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Humphrie08

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable heels
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable & the floral pattern is very fun! I wear an 8 in all Sam Edelman, these are true to size & straps adjust to fit my skinny ankles.
customer_reviews.author: Celia

customer_reviews.title: Love it 🥰
customer_reviews.text: I’m a size 9 in shoes and a 8.5 in open toes. It’s true to size and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this color. not too bright. just right. rock it with denim or even prints. cop. it. hun-ty.
customer_reviews.author: Bellenoire

customer_reviews.title: So cute. Comfy. Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Super cute goes with everything. Awesome brand great quality. You. Will love.
customer_reviews.author: Book club Julie

customer_reviews.title: Completes a simple outfit!
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t worn yet but super comfortable fit! I havevothecSam Edelman’s and I love them all!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eye catchers
customer_reviews.text: Excellent color just too high of a heel to be comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Roberta

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly pretty
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet so not very comfortable but they are soooo pretty! Much better in person than pic.
customer_reviews.author: lees

customer_reviews.title: Not very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: - put too much pressure on the ball of the foot
customer_reviews.author: Jaye H. Cremer

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are perfect. I have small feet and it varies as to whether wide fit is best for me. I bought these in size 6 Wide, and typically buy 6.5 in sneakers (I usually size down for heels!)- these fit perfectly and are really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my college-aged daughter for Christmas. I was skeptical that they would actually be Sam Edelman shoes because they were $13 (!!!), but they were. Arrived in a Sam Edelman box, brand new. She loves them!
customer_reviews.author: NY-CO

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Very narrow at the ball of my foot. I have normal width feet.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Addict

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were very cute and comfortable. They work well for a baby shower or bridal shower where you will be sitting and standing for hours on end.
customer_reviews.author: Idelis Martinez

customer_reviews.title: amazing shoe
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I could wear a 4 inch heel comfortably for an entire night but THIS SHOE PROVED ME WRONG. So comfortable, while also being stylish. I love the mint green color, it surprisingly goes with everything - is a great pop of color to spice up your fit! LOVE.
customer_reviews.author: meeeeshy

customer_reviews.title: Yes do it!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these heels! Go with just about everything. And comfort is not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Auricle2014

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The strings are too small and after a w hole your feet start to hurt.
customer_reviews.author: francis`

customer_reviews.title: Exact size, beautiful shoe
customer_reviews.text: Loved the style, perfect fit and exactly what was needed to complete the outfit!
customer_reviews.author: Corena Hall

customer_reviews.title: Loved these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty shoe. High heel. Beautiful color and the fit was true to size
customer_reviews.author: melissa droffner

customer_reviews.title: so cute!
customer_reviews.text: they run a little big - order a half size down
customer_reviews.author: rangelar

customer_reviews.title: so adorable but just not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: love the way these shoes look. they make any outfit pop. the only problem is that after wearing them for a short period of time they're very uncomfortable. so sad as i would wear them so much more often if they were comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used and dirty
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed. These shoes were clearly pre worn. They arrived dirty and with someone else’s toe marks still in them. The suede was in poor shape. Unfortunately these will be going back as the price does not justify dirty pre worn shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Carlie

product_meta.title: Sam Edelman Women's Yaro Sandals
product_meta.description:
Ankle strap sandal available in an array of colors

Sam Edelman shoes epitomize chic comfort. With exceptional materials and fine styling, each pair of Sam Edelman shoes is an affordable luxury that cleverly combines a youthful outlook with a worldly sensibility. Sophistication with down-to-earth appeal mean that these shoes are made to be lived in. Whether it's a classic revisited for a modern interpretation or a cutting edge design, Sam Edelman shoes always keep an emphasis on comfort.
